isis.stitle: CAB: 5000i AND 9000i CONVENTIONAL - INSTALL - WINDSHIELD WIPER MOTOR, BRACKET AND LINKAGE ASSEMBLY

svcproc.title: WINDSHIELD WIPER MOTOR, BRACKET AND LINKAGE ASSEMBLY

svcsubproc.title: Install Windshield Wiper Motor, Bracket and Linkage Assembly on Vehicles before 2002 Engines before May 2001
svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 87 for Items in parentheses.

note.para: Figure 87 shows the Windshield Wiper Motor, Bracket and Linkage Assembly used on vehicles with one piece windshields and the Windshield Wiper Motor, Bracket and Linkage Assembly used on vehicles with two piece windshields.

step1.para: Position both ends of windshield wiper motor, bracket and linkage assembly (Item 2) over threaded mounting studs (Item 8) on engine side of cowl and install flat washers and hex lock nuts (Item 1); do not tighten.

Position windshield wiper motor, bracket and linkage assembly (Item 2) over mounting holes on surge tank mounting bracket (Item 7) and install two hex head mach. screw sems assemblies (Item 6) and tighten.
Tighten hex lock nuts (Item 1) at both ends of windshield wiper motor, bracket and linkage assembly (Item 2). Tighten to 155 to 190 Lbf-in (17.5 to 21.5 N•m).
Reach under surge tank (Item 3) and connect windshield wiper motor electrical connector (Item 4) to the wiring harness electrical connector (Item 5).

Install air duct inlet. Refer to
AIR DUCT INLET
, Install Air Duct Inlet.

Install cowl tray. Refer to
COWL TRAY
, Install Cowl Tray.
